content: I'm glad you think so! I've been meaning to explore more features on Instagram, and using Instagram Live to share behind-the-scenes content seems like a great way to engage with my audience. Since I've been getting a lot of engagement on my recent posts, I think it's a good opportunity to take it to the next level. By the way, do you have any tips on how to increase my followers on Instagram? I've been posting regularly and engaging with my audience, but I'd love to grow my following even more.
